text: Margarita Plavunova (1994 – 19 August 2019) was a Russian athlete and artists' model. She was born in Kotovsk in 1994 and was a graduate of the sports department at Tomsk State University. She competed in the national championships and became Russian student champion in the 60m hurdles and also competing in the 100m hurdles and 400m hurdles. Plavunova died suddenly on 19 August 2019 beside a highway in the Morshansky District of the Tambov Oblast region of western Russia at the age of 25 while jogging. Preliminary post- mortem examination suggested acute heart failure. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Tomsk State University alumni Category:Russian female long-distance runners Category:Russian artists' models Category:Sport deaths in Russia Category:People from Podilsk
title: Margarita Plavunova
